translation.en: ♪ Calling Gloria ♪
translation.zh: （傻逼）

translation.en: -All right, Vincent? -Never fucking better, Pete.
translation.zh: 还好吗 文森？ 好得不得了 彼得

translation.en: He knows.
translation.zh: 他知道

translation.en: Excluding the literal sense,
translation.zh: 撇开字面上的意思不谈

translation.en: there are three types of wanker in this world.
translation.zh: 这世上有三种傻逼

translation.en: There's the ones you pity, the sad, boring type of wanker
translation.zh:
第一种是令你同情
可悲、无趣的傻逼

translation.en: who life always seems to enjoy torturing. Not me.
translation.zh:
他们这一生似乎总是受尽折磨
但我不是

translation.en: -[horn honks] -[Vincent] See you later, Pete!
translation.zh: 待会见 彼得！

translation.en: Then there's the irritating types of wanker,
translation.zh: 第二种是讨人厌的傻逼

translation.en: the ones whose only job in life is to stop the rest of us
translation.zh: 他们唯一的目标 就是阻止其他人享受人生

translation.en: enjoying our three score years and ten.
translation.zh: 就是阻止其他人享受人生

translation.en: Again, not me.
translation.zh: 这也不是我

translation.en: [man] Excuse me, you can't park there, mate.
translation.zh: 不好意思 这里禁止停车

translation.en: Finally, you have the show-offs, the posers.
translation.zh: 最后一种 爱现的傻逼

translation.en: The "I'm better than you, fuck everything and everyone twice" type of wankers.
translation.zh: 凡事爱比较 愤世嫉俗、看啥都不顺眼的傻逼

translation.en: I prefer the term "ambitious,"
translation.zh:
我偏好形容他们“有野心”
但无论人们怎么扣帽子

translation.en: but whatever the label, we're the ones you'd better keep your eyes on.
translation.zh:
我偏好形容他们“有野心”
但无论人们怎么扣帽子 我们这种人是你需要特别当心的

translation.en: Good morning, arseholes!
translation.zh: 早安 傻逼们！

translation.en: Full disclosure. You're looking at a room of double-glazing salesmen.
translation.zh:
为你充分揭露 你现在看到的是
一位双层窗推销员的办公室

translation.en: As this is 1983, we're not quite the social pariahs
translation.zh:
在1983年的今天
我们的社会地位并不低

translation.en: you lot probably know and loathe, but give us time.
translation.zh:
你们也许厌恶我们
但仍给我们时间推销

translation.en: This is the Monday morning sales meeting,
translation.zh: 这是周一上午的销售会议

translation.en: where the team hand in their weekly orders.
translation.zh: 组员们会呈上每周订单

translation.en: In theory, a small matter of financial housekeeping.
translation.zh: 理论上这是一件公司财务管理的小事

translation.en: In reality, a dick-swinging contest extraordinaire.
translation.zh: 但实际上 这是一场浑球之间的竞赛

translation.en: -Right, Fitzpatrick, what you got for me? -Oh, fuck off, I went first last week.
translation.zh: 那好 菲茨帕特里克 你先来吧？ 搞屁啊 上周也是我先

translation.en: -Come on, it's Lavatory's turn. -Don't call me that.
translation.zh:
-这次轮到厕所先了
-别这样叫我

translation.en: All right, calm down, Lavatory, it's only a nickname.
translation.zh: 冷静点 厕所只不过是个绰号而已

translation.en: No, a nickname is an affectionate term between mates.
translation.zh: 才怪 绰号是朋友间亲昵的称呼

translation.en: I think you're a massive prick, ergo not a nickname.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是个大臭屌 这可不是绰号

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'll show you a massive prick.
translation.zh: 我倒要让你看看什么叫大臭屌

translation.en: [Vincent] This reprobate is Brian Fitzpatrick.
translation.zh: 这浑球叫布莱恩菲茨帕特里克

translation.en: In life, deeply unlikeable, smarmy and charmless.
translation.zh:
在现实生活中
他是讨人厌、毫无魅力的马屁精

translation.en: But give him something to sell and somehow he becomes transformed.
translation.zh: 但只要把商品交给他推销 他就完全变了一个人

translation.en: Strong?
translation.zh: 强度吗？

translation.en: President Reagan has a fallout shelter made entirely of our windows.
translation.zh:
里根总统有一座
全用本公司的窗户打造的核爆避难所

translation.en: Okay, the science tells us these uPVC window frames
translation.zh:
科学实验已经证实 聚氯乙烯窗框
就算放到人类灭绝也不会坏

translation.en: will be around long after the human race is extinct.
translation.zh:
聚氯乙烯窗框
就算放到人类灭绝也不会坏

translation.en: [Vincent] Also, the proud owner of a massive penis,
translation.zh: 他同时也十分以自己的大屌自豪

translation.en: which he loves to unfurl at any given opportunity.
translation.zh: 绝不放过任何献宝的机会

translation.en: -And that's fine, is it? -[Fitzpatrick sniggering]
translation.zh: 他这么做没问题吗？

translation.en: [Vincent] And this lovely man is Martin Lavender.
translation.zh: 这位帅哥则是马丁拉凡德

translation.en: Honest, decent and well educated.
translation.zh: 诚实、有礼、受过良好教育

translation.en: All qualities which, in our line of work, are as much use as an aerated condom.
translation.zh: 这些特质在我们这一行里 就和充气的保险套一样没用

translation.en: Hello, I'm Martin Lavender from Cachet Windows.
translation.zh: 你好 我是威望门窗的马丁拉凡德

translation.en: -Just eating dinner. -Nope, you have your dinner.
translation.zh: 我正在吃晚餐 那你慢用吧 我改天再来

translation.en: -I'll call back another day. -Thanks, love.
translation.zh: 那你慢用吧 我改天再来 谢谢 亲爱的

translation.en: [Vincent] Formerly a musician,
translation.zh: 本来玩音乐的他

translation.en: he quit his struggling band to join my sales team.
translation.zh:
退出了无人问津的乐团
成为我的组员

translation.en: [Vincent] Unfortunately, three months later, his now ex-band
translation.zh:
很不幸地 在他退团三个月后
他的前团员们

translation.en: landed the biggest number-one single of the year with "Wherever I Lay My Hat."
translation.zh:
很不幸地 在他退团三个月后
他的前团员们 以一曲《四海为家》
空降年度最红单曲

translation.en: ♪ Wherever I lay my hat, that's my home ♪
translation.zh: （第一名：保罗杨） （不是拉凡德） （第一名：保罗杨）

translation.en: [Vincent] Naturally, we rallied around to help him through this difficult period.
translation.zh: 自然而然地 我们帮助他走过了低潮

translation.en: Ehhh!
translation.zh: 你看！

translation.en: [Fitzpatrick] Unlucky, mate, could've been you!
translation.zh:
真是太不幸了 兄弟
你本来会成功的

translation.en: Right, come on, look, I wanna see some orders. Don't be shy, Lavender.
translation.zh: 够了 来谈正事吧 给我看订单 别害羞 拉凡德

translation.en: His mother wasn't.
translation.zh: 他老妈可不害羞

translation.en: -Four. -[Fitzpatrick] Bollocks.
translation.zh:
-四千元
-屁啦！

translation.en: Four thousand. Gotta be a personal best for you.
translation.zh: 四千是你的个人最高业绩吧？

translation.en: Could've been seven if this snake hadn't undercut me on Warren Close.
translation.zh:
要不是他抢了沃伦克鲁斯公寓的订单
本来能达到七千的

translation.en: You're having a laugh. There's nothing wrong with my prices.
translation.zh: 别笑死人了 那和我开的价没关系 是你的问题

translation.en: It's just you. You couldn't sell ice to a bloody Eskimo.
translation.zh: 你连卖冰给爱斯基摩人都没办法

translation.en: But Eskimos don't need ice. Why would I sell it to them?
translation.zh:
爱斯基摩人又不需要冰
我干吗卖给他们？

translation.en: You know, because of the saying, "he could sell ice to the Eskimos."
translation.zh:
因为有句谚语是这么说的
“他能叫爱斯基摩人买冰”

translation.en: -You're the fucking opposite, in't ya? -Yeah, that's not how opposites work.
translation.zh: 你他妈的根本相反 相反不是这个意思好吗？

translation.en: [whispers] I get a lot of this.
translation.zh: 我司空见惯了

translation.en: All right then, you couldn't sell food to a starving Ethiopian,
translation.zh:
那好吧 你连卖食物
给一位饥饿、眼周飞满苍蝇

translation.en: with flies round his eyes and pot belly, shit up his legs.
translation.zh:
腿上沾满自己屎尿的
埃塞俄比亚人都没办法

translation.en: I'd just give him some food. I'm not a monster.
translation.zh: 我会免费送他食物 我还有人性

translation.en: Which is why I will always outsell you in any sales environment.
translation.zh:
这也是为何在任何环境下
我的业绩都会超越你

translation.en: So you reckon you could sell ice to the Eskimos?
translation.zh: 你自认为能卖冰给爱斯基摩人？

translation.en: Not only sell it to 'em. By the time I'd left their igloo,
translation.zh: 不只卖给他们 当我离开冰屋时

translation.en: they'd be asking me to be godfather to their adorable slanty-eyed kids.
translation.zh:
他们还会请我当
他们单眼皮孩子的教父

translation.en: Tell me, is it only lazy cultural stereotypes
translation.zh: 你除了胡扯文化刻板印象外

translation.en: you sell to, or real people too?
translation.zh: 还能卖产品给真人？

translation.en: Well, unlike Professor No-Nuts over there, I can sell anything to anyone.
translation.zh: 不像那一位没蛋蛋教授 我能卖任何东西给任何人

translation.en: So taking the "ice and Eskimos" analogy, you reckon you could sell new windows
translation.zh:
除了卖冰给爱斯基摩人 你自认可以卖窗户
给刚跟你买新窗户的人？

translation.en: to someone you've recently sold new windows to?
translation.zh:
你自认可以卖窗户
给刚跟你买新窗户的人？

translation.en: -Yes. -I've got a tonne says you can't.
translation.zh: 可以 赌一千你办不到

translation.en: You had a tonne.
translation.zh: 我奉陪

translation.en: You might as well hand over those notes now, Lavatory.
translation.zh: 等着把钱交出来吧 厕所

translation.en: Right, if you bucks are done rutting, I want to see some orders. Brian.
translation.zh:
够了 你们吵完之后
记得给我看订单 布莱恩？

translation.en: Thirteen five.
translation.zh: 一万三千五百

translation.en: [Vincent whistles] Impressive.
translation.zh: 了不起

translation.en: Who would have thought a weasely fucker with terrible BO like you
translation.zh:
谁能料到一个
像你这样狡猾又有体臭的王八蛋

translation.en: could charm the life savings out of anyone?
translation.zh: 能骗走别人的积蓄？

translation.en: Well, here's mine.
translation.zh: 那么 轮到我了

translation.en: Just the 17k.
translation.zh: 不多 才一万七

translation.en: Which makes me employee of the fucking century.
translation.zh: 这表示我是本世纪最屌员工

translation.en: But don't feel too bad about it, boys, it's still a record week.
translation.zh: 别太难过 孩子们 这周还没结束

translation.en: And to celebrate, I've lined up a special treat for us all on Saturday night.
translation.zh:
为了庆祝
我在周六晚上安排了特别节目

translation.en: Now, let's get out there.
translation.zh: 好了 出去干活吧

translation.en: These windows aren't gonna sell them-fucking-selves.
translation.zh: 这些窗户不会他妈的把自己卖出去

translation.en: Morning, Vincent.
translation.zh:
-早 文森
-早 卡萝

translation.en: Morning, Carol. Dig out the address for the Solomon house.
translation.zh: 你能帮我查所罗门先生的地址吗？

translation.en: I've got time to pop by later.
translation.zh: 我稍后得去拜访一趟

translation.en: Guess who...
translation.zh: 猜猜我是谁？

translation.en: The last time I saw these beautiful fingers,
translation.zh: 我上次见到这双纤纤玉手

translation.en: they were wrapped around my...
translation.zh: 是握在我的…

translation.en: -...has got the kids with them? -My neck.
translation.zh:
-孩子们也来了
-脖子上

translation.en: They were wrapped around my neck.
translation.zh: 掐在我的脖子上

translation.en: -My fault for farting in bed, eh, Sam? -That's not what you were gonna say.
translation.zh:
抱歉我在被窝放屁 珊 -你本来不是要说这个
-他本来要说什么？

translation.en: -What was he gonna say? -Nothing. Go and play outside.
translation.zh:
-你本来不是要说这个
-他本来要说什么？ 没什么 去外面玩吧

translation.en: -Go on, I want a word with your dad. -Hello, baby.
translation.zh: 去吧 我有话和爸爸说 你好 宝贝

translation.en: Oh, I know. Incredible, isn't she?
translation.zh: 我知道 她超正 对吧？

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: I thought Cachet's number-one salesman might like some lunch.
translation.zh:
我想威望的王牌推销员
可能想吃点午餐

translation.en: It's only cheese, but I swiped a Penguin
translation.zh:
只有夹起司 不过 我从罗比的学校晚餐盒里
偷拿了一个小点心

translation.en: from Robbie's school dinner tin as a treat.
translation.zh:
我从罗比的学校晚餐盒里
偷拿了一个小点心

translation.en: I do not deserve an angel like you in my life.
translation.zh: 我配不上像你这样的天使

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: What time are you home? I'm doing a curry.
translation.zh: 你今晚几点回家？我要煮咖哩

translation.en: Can't do tonight, I've got house calls to make.
translation.zh: 我今晚不回家了 我得去拜访客户

translation.en: You are joking. This is the third night this week.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗？这星期第三次了

translation.en: Sam, honey.
translation.zh: 珊 我的甜心

translation.en: The best time to close a deal is when the husband and wife are both there.
translation.zh:
我推销成功的最佳时机
就是客户夫妻俩都在家的时候

translation.en: Evenings, weekends, these are the golden hours.
translation.zh: 晚上、周末都是黄金时段

translation.en: And when do you plan on fitting us into your hectic schedule, then? Christmas?
translation.zh: 那你计划什么时候才陪我们？ 圣诞节？银行休假日？

translation.en: Bank holidays?
translation.zh: 圣诞节？银行休假日？

translation.en: I'm trying to build something for us here.
translation.zh: 我这是为了我们的将来

translation.en: In a few months, I'll ease off, but not right now.
translation.zh:
再过几个月我就能放松了
但不是现在

translation.en: I'll make it up to you, gorgeous. I promise.
translation.zh: 我会补偿你的 宝贝 我保证

translation.en: You realise there is no part of this I cannot see?
translation.zh: 你知道我看得一清二楚吧？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Don't worry.
translation.zh: 你在干吗？ 算了 我显然不该来的

translation.en: -I'm obviously not wanted here. -Sam. Come back.
translation.zh: 算了 我显然不该来的 珊 回来

translation.en: Sam, come back! Ignore her, she's mental.
translation.zh: 别理她 她是神经病

translation.en: "Thanks for rescuing me, Carol" might be nice.
translation.zh:
是“多谢你救了我 卡萝”
这句才对吧

translation.en: [Vincent] Meanwhile, it hadn't taken Fitzpatrick long
translation.zh: 在此同时 菲茨帕特里克很快地

translation.en: to find a 73 year-old Eskimo to sell ice to.
translation.zh:
就找到了一位73岁的爱斯基摩人
准备卖冰给她

translation.en: But you only put these windows in three weeks ago.
translation.zh: 可是你三个星期前才装好这些窗户

translation.en: I know, Mrs. Brown. I'm embarrassed to be here.
translation.zh:
我知道 布朗太太
我也很抱歉再度来访

translation.en: But it's only just come to light that there is a major design flaw
translation.zh:
但我们刚才得知
这些塑胶窗框的设计上

translation.en: in the plastic frames of those windows that no one could have foreseen.
translation.zh: 有一个意料之外的重大缺陷

translation.en: The white bits? Yeah, the white bits.
translation.zh:
-是那些白点吗？
-就是那些白点 没错

translation.en: See, they're made from a plastic compound called
translation.zh:
这些白点是用一种
叫未塑化聚氯乙烯的材质做的

translation.en: un-plasticised poly vinyl chloride, or uPVC for short.
translation.zh:
这些白点是用一种
叫未塑化聚氯乙烯的材质做的 通称为聚氯乙烯

translation.en: We've only just discovered that when exposed to sunlight,
translation.zh: 我们刚发现这种塑料

translation.en: that type of plastic might explode.
translation.zh: 暴露在阳光下时可能会爆炸

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Oh no, indeed.
translation.zh:
-真可怕
-确实很可怕

translation.en: But it's not all bad news.
translation.zh: 但还是有好消息的

translation.en: Have you heard of NASA?
translation.zh: 你听过美国国家航空航天局吗？

translation.en: The space people?
translation.zh: 太空人的组织？

translation.en: They're the ones.
translation.zh: 就是他们

translation.en: Now, as part of the Space Shuttle program,
translation.zh: 他们在建造航天飞机时

translation.en: they have developed a far superior plastic compound,
translation.zh: 研发出了一种更为先进的塑料

translation.en: one that won't kill you.
translation.zh: 保证不会害死你

translation.en: Does it have a name?
translation.zh: 那种塑料有名称吗？

translation.en: Yep, it's called PVCu.
translation.zh: 有的 就叫做 “乙烯聚氯”

translation.en: So, what I would like to do is exchange these dangerous uPVC windows
translation.zh: 我愿意将府上 这些危险的聚氯乙烯材质窗

translation.en: for nice, new, safe PVCu ones, free of charge, apart from installation costs.
translation.zh: 免费更换成全新、安全的乙烯聚氯窗 只收你安装费就好

translation.en: Ooh, I don't know. I should probably ask my son about that.
translation.zh:
不好意思
我得先问问我儿子才能决定

translation.en: Is your son Neil Armstrong?
translation.zh: 令郎是尼尔阿姆斯特朗吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: Then I don't think he's qualified to help us.
translation.zh: 那么我不认为他帮得上忙

translation.en: Read it and weep.
translation.zh: 准备流泪吧

translation.en: The whole house? How have you done that?
translation.zh: 整栋房子的窗户？你怎么办到的？

translation.en: You know, sales acumen, charm. Oh no, wait, you don't know, do you?
translation.zh: 你知道的 凭我的聪明才智及魅力 等等 你不知道吧？

translation.en: Now, come on, you owe me a tonne.
translation.zh: 你现在欠我1000元了

translation.en: Hold on, you've only charged her a hundred quid for fitting.
translation.zh: 等等 你只收她100元安装费

translation.en: Have you given her a house full of free windows to win a bet?
translation.zh:
你为她免费换窗
只是为了赢得赌注吗？

translation.en: Lavatory... The word "free" is not in my vocabulary.
translation.zh: 厕所 我的字典里没有“免费”两字

translation.en: Just like the phrase "I've had a number-one hit" is not in yours.
translation.zh:
就如同你的字典里
没有“我唱过热门金曲”一样

translation.en: No, I've got a fitter coming tomorrow to rip out those windows
translation.zh:
这下子我明天还得请工人来
把这些窗户拆下

translation.en: and pop the very same ones straight back in again.
translation.zh: 再把它们一模一样地装回去

translation.en: The old bag'll never know.
translation.zh: 那头老母猪根本不会知道

translation.en: So not only have I sold ice to the Eskimos,
translation.zh: 看来我不只卖冰给爱斯基摩人

translation.en: I've sold them their own fucking ice. I'm a genius.
translation.zh: 还让他们买了自己的冰 我真是个天才！快付钱吧

translation.en: Come on, pay up.
translation.zh: 我真是个天才！快付钱吧

translation.en: Oh, yes, there we go. Ooh, num-num-num-num.
translation.zh: 这还差不多

translation.en: Unlike Fitzpatrick, I don't need to use the dark arts to close a deal.
translation.zh:
和菲茨帕特里克不同
我不需要用骗术就能成功推销

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. Solomon. Vincent from Cachet Windows.
translation.zh:
早安 所罗门先生
我是威望门窗的文森

translation.en: We spoke on the phone earlier.
translation.zh: 我们稍早通过电话

translation.en: Ah, Mr. Vincent, yes.
translation.zh: 文森先生 我想起来了

translation.en: Look, I'm so sorry, but we're about to sit down for prayer.
translation.zh:
真不好意思
但我们得坐下进行祷告了

translation.en: Maybe you can leave some brochures and we can phone you about prices tomorrow?
translation.zh: 你先留下商品型录 我们明天再打给你询价 如何？

translation.en: Wanna know the percentage who sleep on it and call you back? A big fat fucking zero.
translation.zh: 有多少人隔天真的会打给你？ 他妈的没有人

translation.en: This may sound odd, but may I join?
translation.zh:
这可能有点唐突
但我能加入你们吗？

translation.en: It's been a spiritually exhausting last few days for me.
translation.zh:
我的心灵在过去几天
也十分筋疲力尽

translation.en: Eh... Well, we'd be delighted. Come in.
translation.zh: 欢迎你 进来吧

translation.en: One more thing...
translation.zh: 还有一件事 推销员就像吸血鬼

translation.en: Salesmen are like vampires... never invite one into your home.
translation.zh: 还有一件事 推销员就像吸血鬼 千万别邀请他们进门

translation.en: Once you do, we won't leave your side until we taste blood, not even for a piss.
translation.zh:
否则我们只有尝到血后
才会离开你身边 途中连撇尿都不去

translation.en: -Thank you! -Oh, no problem.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-不客气 进来吧

translation.en: The peace...
translation.zh: 内心平和…

translation.en: [Vincent] Using a homeowner's loo is a cardinal sin,
translation.zh: 借用屋主的厕所是大忌

translation.en: no matter how desperate you are.
translation.zh: 无论你有多急

translation.en: The second you leave those poor bastards alone,
translation.zh: 你只要一离开这些可怜虫

translation.en: they'll try to conspire a way to get you out of their house.
translation.zh: 他们就会想办法把你赶出去

translation.en: You need to get the kids to bed?
translation.zh: 得让孩子睡觉了？没问题

translation.en: That's okay, I'll give you a hand with bath time.
translation.zh: 得让孩子睡觉了？没问题 我和你一起帮他洗澡

translation.en: Your husband is having a heart attack?
translation.zh: 你先生心脏病发作？

translation.en: Let me run you both down to A&E, you lying shit-bags.
translation.zh:
让我送你们去急诊吧
两个说谎的混蛋

translation.en: These God-fearing fuckers have been praying for almost two hours.
translation.zh:
这些畏神的王八蛋
已经祷告将近两小时了

translation.en: And it's not just world peace shit, either.
translation.zh:
内容还不只是
祈求世界和平之类的狗屁

translation.en: [woman] Lord, please use thy divine power
translation.zh: 主啊 请施展你的神力

translation.en: to find a good cash buyer for Brian and Kellie's car.
translation.zh:
找到一位好买家
来买布莱恩和凯莉的车

translation.en: Dear merciful Lord, please do what you can
translation.zh: 仁慈的主啊 请尽你的力量

translation.en: to get a better reception for Aggy's TV.
translation.zh: 使艾吉的电视收讯更好

translation.en: Dear Lord, please give me the strength not to piss my pants in front of these time-wasting sons of bitches.
translation.zh:
亲爱的主 请让我别在
这群浪费时间的杂种面前尿裤子

translation.en: Eventually my bladder's prayers were answered
translation.zh: 最后我为膀胱的祈祷应验了

translation.en: and Mr. Solomon signed for a full house of windows.
translation.zh:
所罗门先生也签下了
整栋房子窗户的订单

translation.en: It's safe to say I eat, sleep, breathe, shit and piss...
translation.zh: 我除了吃喝拉撒以外 最会的就是卖

translation.en: [sighs] sales.
translation.zh: 这样说也不为过

translation.en: But like Einstein, my true genius wasn't spotted until later in life.
translation.zh:
但就像爱因斯坦
我的天赋是直到后来才被发掘的

translation.en: ♪ Hit me with your rhythm stick ♪
translation.zh: （六个月前）

translation.en: [Vincent] So after spending a couple of grand
translation.zh: 在花了几千元

translation.en: having this fucking mutt's back legs amputated
translation.zh:
把这条臭杂种狗的后腿截肢
并装上轮椅后

translation.en: and wheels put on it, he takes it out for its first walk
translation.zh:
把这条臭杂种狗的后腿截肢
并装上轮椅后 他第一次带它出去散步
结果这臭狗却吓得乱跑

translation.en: and the fucking dog panics and rolls straight under a bus.
translation.zh:
他第一次带它出去散步
结果这臭狗却吓得乱跑 结果被一辆公交车辗过

translation.en: Poor bastard is devastated.
translation.zh: 可怜的家伙伤心极了

translation.en: I told him to look on the bright side... At least now you got a 2,000 pound rug.
translation.zh: 我告诉他：“看开一点 至少你现在有条两千元的地毯了”

translation.en: Yeah, this is him.
translation.zh: 我就是

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 操

translation.en: Now, that was a call informing me that while I'd been otherwise engaged,
translation.zh:
那通电话是打来通知我
就在我上班时

translation.en: a super tanker on the Thames estuary had been accidentally loaded
translation.zh: 一艘在泰晤士河口的超大型油轮 意外装载了受污染的原油

translation.en: with contaminated crude oil.
translation.zh: 意外装载了受污染的原油

translation.en: Unfortunately, the constant monitoring required to prevent
translation.zh: 很不幸地 我唯一的工作

translation.en: such million-pound fuck-ups was my one and only job.
translation.zh:
就是随时监视着这艘船
避免发生这种损失上百万的鸟事

translation.en: Upon careful reflection,
translation.zh: 经过审慎评估后

translation.en: you are to be relieved of all duties with immediate effect.
translation.zh: 我们决定即刻解除你们两位的职务

translation.en: Do you have anything to say for the record, Mr. Swan?
translation.zh: 你有意见吗 史温先生？

translation.en: -This is fucking ridiculous. -Maybe we should take a break.
translation.zh: 这他妈的太荒谬了 也许我们应该休息一下

translation.en: Listen, I've spoken to the boys,
translation.zh: 我和兄弟们说过了

translation.en: they're ready to walk out for you on this one, Vince.
translation.zh: 这件事他们愿意挺你 文森

translation.en: I appreciate the support of the Union on this, Terry, but I'm jacking it in.
translation.zh: 我很感激你们情义相挺 泰瑞 但我不干了

translation.en: -[Terry scoffs] -I fucking hate this job anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我超讨厌这份工作

translation.en: How are you gonna provide for Sam and the kids?
translation.zh: 你要怎么养珊和孩子们？

translation.en: I'll figure something out.
translation.zh: 我会想办法

translation.en: Oi, you two, the charisma twins.
translation.zh: 你们这对魅力双胞胎

translation.en: Upon careful reflection, I've decided you can stick your job up your arses.
translation.zh: 经过审慎评估后 我决定辞掉这份狗屁工作

translation.en: Here's my notice of resignation.
translation.zh: 这是我的辞呈

translation.en: I couldn't face going home to tell Sam I'd lost my job.
translation.zh: 我无法回家告诉珊我丢了工作

translation.en: I said I'd figure something out, and that's what I intended to do,
translation.zh:
我说我会想办法
而在我喝了个烂醉后

translation.en: right after I got absolutely rat-arsed.
translation.zh: 我开始思考各种办法

translation.en: Hmm. I never was a whiskey drinker.
translation.zh: 我从来就喝不惯威士忌

translation.en: Fuck me. Vincent Swan.
translation.zh: 见鬼了 是文森史温

translation.en: Dicky Cox?
translation.zh: 迪奇考克斯？

translation.en: Dicky Dip Shits, I think you used to call me at school.
translation.zh: 记得你以前在学校常骂我蠢蛋迪奇

translation.en: -Cox by name, cock by nature. -Yeah, that was another one.
translation.zh: 姓考克斯的天生傻逼 这句你也常骂

translation.en: -You all right, Vince? You look like shit. -No. No, I'm not all right, Dicky.
translation.zh: 你还好吧？你看起来超狼狈 不 我一点也不好 迪奇

translation.en: I got sacked this morning and now I'm crying next to a urinal
translation.zh:
我今早被炒鱿鱼了 而我正靠着充满自己呕吐物的小便斗
哭着和你说话

translation.en: full of my own puke, talking to you.
translation.zh:
而我正靠着充满自己呕吐物的小便斗
哭着和你说话

translation.en: No offence, but I think I just hit rock bottom.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 但我的人生跌到谷底了

translation.en: I mean, it's funny how life turns out, innit?
translation.zh: 命运很可笑 对吧？

translation.en: Who'd have put money on me being the bloody successful one,
translation.zh: 有谁想过我会功成名就？

translation.en: and you, Vincent Swan, being such a fucking loser?
translation.zh: 而文森史温竟会沦落至此？

translation.en: Cheers for the pep talk, Coxy.
translation.zh: 多谢你的鼓励 迪奇

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Vincent, what would you say if I told you
translation.zh: 文森 如果我告诉你 我上周的收入是你月薪的四倍

translation.en: I earned four times as much as your monthly wage in the last week?
translation.zh: 我上周的收入是你月薪的四倍 你会怎么说？

translation.en: I'd say, unless the demand for creepy-looking gigolos
translation.zh: 我会说：“除非现在丑牛郎正当红

translation.en: has gone through the roof, that's bollocks.
translation.zh: 不然我听他在放屁”

translation.en: Yeah, funny.
translation.zh: 很好笑

translation.en: Here...
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: Have a chuckle at that.
translation.zh: 尽管笑吧

translation.en: Plus, I've got something else that could interest you.
translation.zh: 我还有件你会感兴趣的东西

translation.en: What I've got in here might just change your life.
translation.zh: 这东西可能会改变你的人生

translation.en: I'm not a complete fucking yokel, I've done coke before.
translation.zh: 我又不是乡巴佬 我早吸过可卡因了

translation.en: I'm not talking about the drugs.
translation.zh: 我不是在说毒品

translation.en: -[chuckles] -A lump of fucking plastic?
translation.zh:
-这什么？一支塑胶条？
-这是塑胶？

translation.en: Is it? Or...
translation.zh:
-这什么？一支塑胶条？
-这是塑胶？ 还是白金？

translation.en: is it white gold?
translation.zh: 还是白金？

translation.en: -No, it's definitely a lump of plastic. -Oh, to the uninitiated.
translation.zh: 不 这绝对是塑胶 对外行人来说是

translation.en: But you add some know-how and some bullshit,
translation.zh: 但只要加入一点技巧及话术

translation.en: and this lump of fucking plastic turns into something far more eye-catching.
translation.zh:
这支破烂的塑胶条
就能变成某样更吸睛的东西

translation.en: [Vincent] Coxy laid out the double-glazing business for me.
translation.zh: 考克斯带我入了双层窗业

translation.en: Since Thatcher handed us the right to buy your council house, the world and his wife
translation.zh: 自从撒切尔夫人允许国宅私有化后 世人掀起了一股

translation.en: were madly renovating their newly owned dream homes.
translation.zh: 装潢自家的热潮

translation.en: White gold was just plastic, a cheap alternative to timber,
translation.zh:
白金只不过是塑胶
一种廉价的木材替代品

translation.en: but it brought the cost of making brand-new windows down to peanuts.
translation.zh: 但却大幅降低了制造新窗户的成本

translation.en: Coxy would then sell them on with a 600% mark-up.
translation.zh: 然后考克斯再以成本的六倍价格售出

translation.en: For those that couldn't afford the astronomical prices,
translation.zh: 对于负担不起这笔天文数字的人

translation.en: he'd sell them finance.
translation.zh: 他通过融资

translation.en: That way they could pay back what they thought they could afford each month
translation.zh: 让这些人以分期付款 缴上一辈子的贷款

translation.en: for the rest of their natural lives.
translation.zh: 缴上一辈子的贷款

translation.en: Eventually those shiny new windows would cost more
translation.zh: 最后他们花在这些光亮新窗户上的钱

translation.en: than their dreary former council houses.
translation.zh: 将比他们的旧国宅还多

translation.en: It was beautiful.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: I want this.
translation.zh: 这就是我要的

translation.en: Oh. You can have it. No, not this.
translation.zh:
-给你吧
-不是这个！

translation.en: I mean meeting you. Losing my job. Everything.
translation.zh: 我是指遇见你 还有失业 这一切

translation.en: This happened for a reason.
translation.zh: 都是命中注定的

translation.en: You ain't gonna cry again, are you?
translation.zh: 你该不会又要哭了吧？

translation.en: You always were a fucking dip shit.
translation.zh: 你这蠢蛋还是一样蠢

translation.en: [Vincent] My fate was sealed the very next day.
translation.zh: 隔天 我的命运就此改变

translation.en: I'm not a big believer in kismet,
translation.zh: 我不怎么相信天命 但你得又聋又瞎

translation.en: but you'd have to be blind, deaf and dumb as shit not to hear destiny calling me.
translation.zh: 我不怎么相信天命 但你得又聋又瞎 又蠢得要命才听不见命运的呼唤
（文森 你注定在此发挥你的天赋）

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了

translation.en: It's an elephant, it's not male genitalia.
translation.zh: 这是一只大象 不是阳具

translation.en: -I'm looking for the owner. -Sorry, I'm new here.
translation.zh:
我想找老板 -抱歉 我是新来的
-了解

translation.en: Right. Is the owner around?
translation.zh: 老板在吗？

translation.en: Like I said, I'm new, so I literally can't help you.
translation.zh:
我说过了 我是新来的
所以我无法帮你

translation.en: Fuck me, Carol. You're a receptionist.
translation.zh: 真要命 卡萝 你是接待人员

translation.en: Just take some details, will you?
translation.zh: 好歹也把话问清楚吧？

translation.en: It doesn't hurt to be careful, Tony. He's just wandered in off the street.
translation.zh: 小心驶得万年船 托尼 他是从街上闲逛进来的

translation.en: This is a fucking showroom.
translation.zh: 这是一间展示厅！

translation.en: We want people to wander in off the street.
translation.zh: 我们欢迎路人闲逛进来

translation.en: Hello, sir, I take it this is your business?
translation.zh: 先生 你好 想必你就是老板了？

translation.en: -You've got two minutes, pal. -For what?
translation.zh:
-给你两分钟 老弟
-做什么？

translation.en: To sell me whatever the fuck it is you're selling and then fuck off.
translation.zh: 向我推销你的狗屁产品 然后滚出去

translation.en: [Vincent] Meet Tony Walsh, the world's angriest small business owner.
translation.zh:
这是托尼沃什
世上最愤怒的小企业主

translation.en: No, I don't want to sell to you, I want to sell for you. My name's Vincent.
translation.zh:
我不想卖东西给你
而是为你卖东西 我叫文森

translation.en: I don't care if it's Barbra Streisand. I've already got a sales team.
translation.zh: 就算你是芭芭拉史翠珊我也不管 我已经有一组推销员了

translation.en: Well, that was succinct. Now we've got 90 seconds to fill with small talk.
translation.zh: 你说话还真简洁有力 我们这段对话还有90秒

translation.en: -Or you could just fuck off early. -Right. And where's the fun in that?
translation.zh: 你也可以提早滚出去 没错 但那样乐趣何在？

translation.en: You see that couple? They walked in your showroom four minutes ago.
translation.zh:
见到那对夫妻了吗？
他们4分钟前走进你的展示厅

translation.en: In another 45 seconds, they're gonna walk out, along with thousands in lost revenue.
translation.zh: 45秒后他们就会离去 你也将损失数千元的收入

translation.en: I've got twenty quid that says Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee over there
translation.zh:
我赌20镑 他们离开后
半斤和八两还是只会坐在那抓屁股

translation.en: will still be scratching their arses when they walk out.
translation.zh:
他们离开后
半斤和八两还是只会坐在那抓屁股

translation.en: All right, pal, here's a price list.
translation.zh: 好吧 老弟 这是价目表

translation.en: You sign them up, I'll give you a two-week trial.
translation.zh: 签下去 我给你两周试用期

translation.en: -I hear congratulations are in order! -Eh, sorry?
translation.zh:
我都听说了 恭喜两位 -不好意思？
-第100名顾客奖？

translation.en: The Centennial Customer Award? No one told you?
translation.zh:
-不好意思？
-第100名顾客奖？ 没人告诉你们吗？

translation.en: As our hundredth customer today, you've won the opportunity
translation.zh: 作为今天的第100名顾客 你们赢得了威望门窗所提供的

translation.en: to turn your house into a show-home for the Cachet range of windows and doors.
translation.zh: 你们赢得了威望门窗所提供的 住宅门窗淘旧换新机会

translation.en: -My name's Vincent, nice to meet you. -Hi, I'm Mark. This is my wife Lorna.
translation.zh:
我叫文森 很高兴认识你们 -我是马克 这是我太太 萝娜
-你好

translation.en: Hello. Wow, we've never won anything before.
translation.zh:
-我是马克 这是我太太 萝娜
-你好 我们从没赢过任何奖

translation.en: Well, I guess some people are born lucky
translation.zh: 有些人天生运气好

translation.en: and the rest of us just have to make do with good looks and charm, eh?
translation.zh:
而我们这种人
就得靠外表和魅力吃饭 对吧？

translation.en: So tell me, Mark, Lorna, why are you looking for new windows?
translation.zh:
那么 马克和萝娜
你们为何想找新窗户？

translation.en: [Vincent] Ten minutes of bullshit later, and I was ready to seal the deal.
translation.zh:
胡扯十分钟后
我已经准备成交这笔订单了

translation.en: All of our products come with safety glass fitted as standard.
translation.zh:
本公司所有的产品
都是由标准安全玻璃制成

translation.en: Now, I'd imagine those little boys of yours are
translation.zh: 我猜你们家的小捣蛋

translation.en: always keep you on your toes, right, Lorna? Always darting about?
translation.zh: 常使你担心吧？萝娜 老是在家里横冲直撞？

translation.en: Now imagine them running full pelt into a plate glass window.
translation.zh:
想象以高速撞上一扇平版玻璃窗
会有什么后果

translation.en: It turned out that not all of our products came with safety glass fitted as standard.
translation.zh:
结果并非所有本公司的产品
都是由标准安全玻璃制成

translation.en: It's probably hard, at this point,
translation.zh: 你们很难不去想象自己的宝贝儿子

translation.en: not to picture your precious offspring lying in a pool of their own blood.
translation.zh: 你们很难不去想象自己的宝贝儿子 倒卧在血泊中

translation.en: But hold onto that thought, because this, Lorna, pardon my French,
translation.zh:
但不必担心 萝娜
因为这扇窗 恕我直言

translation.en: this disgraceful piece of shit
translation.zh: 这扇丢人现眼的烂窗

translation.en: is a well-known national company's patio door.
translation.zh:
是由一间知名国营企业
所生产的落地窗

translation.en: I can't say who. [whispering] Everest.
translation.zh: 名字我不能说 其实是珠峰公司

translation.en: Christ, it makes me angry. Doesn't anyone ever think of the children?
translation.zh: 老天 我真的很气 难道没人在意孩子的安全吗？

translation.en: Well, thankfully, here at Cachet, we do.
translation.zh: 幸好在威望门窗 我们在意

translation.en: Maybe it was the adrenaline in everybody's systems,
translation.zh: 也许是客户的肾上腺素作祟

translation.en: but by the time I'd finished, they'd signed for five grand's worth of windows.
translation.zh: 当我推销完毕 他们签下了五千元的窗户订单

translation.en: The second I left the showroom, Walshy called his wife.
translation.zh:
我一离开展示厅
沃什就马上打给他老婆

translation.en: I think I've just met the man who's going to make us our first million.
translation.zh:
我找到能为我们
赚进第一个一百万的人了

translation.en: [Vincent] He was so impressed, he didn't offer me a trial.
translation.zh: 他对我满意到连试用期都免了

translation.en: He put me in charge of his entire sales team,
translation.zh: 还直接让我接管整个销售组

translation.en: who I promptly sacked.
translation.zh: 我马上炒了两名组员

translation.en: Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum went out the door and in came Tweedle Dumb and Dumber.
translation.zh: 半斤和八两被淘汰出局 取而代之的是阿呆与阿瓜

translation.en: And after Fitzpatrick and Lavender graduated
translation.zh: 当菲茨帕特里克和拉凡德

translation.en: from the Vincent Swan School of Sales, my team was complete.
translation.zh:
从文森史温销售学院毕业后
我的组终于完整了

translation.en: Once Walsh's tasteless decor had been replaced with something more befitting
translation.zh:
沃什俗气的旧装潢 被和我们一样
得体、高尚的家具所取代

translation.en: of a classy operation like ours, Cachet Windows was reborn.
translation.zh:
被和我们一样
得体、高尚的家具所取代 威望门窗重生了

translation.en: Right!
translation.zh: 听好了

translation.en: First and only rule... We don't rip off anyone in our town.
translation.zh:
销售守则第一兼唯一一条
不剥镇上老百姓的皮

translation.en: These are our neighbours, our friends.
